com.sri.kernel
Class Diagnostics.DiagnosticPrintStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.PrintStream
              com.sri.kernel.Diagnostics.DiagnosticPrintStream
Enclosing class:
Diagnostics
public class Diagnostics.DiagnosticPrintStream
extends java.io.PrintStream

A Sub-class to manage the diagnostic print stream. Used to filter diagnostic information to two layers. One is the underlying PrintStream, represented by a Logger object, and the other is a user specified print stream. The first stream is used to catch all messages for the diagnostic log. The second is to send information to the originating diagnostic call.

It provides a println(String s) function to catch output and dispatch appropriately. All messages should be sent using the println(String s) function, and none others. All others will be passed directly to the underlying print stream, which in this case is the Logger used by the Diagnostics
